explains: n. 费力，努力；运用，行使

sentences.en: Climbing further, with renewed courage, he at last saw his goal before him, but not without long and weary exertion.
sentences.cn: 他又重新鼓起勇气，继续往上爬，他终于看到了眼前的目标，但还需要经过漫长而疲惫的努力才能到达。

sentences.en: He clearly found the physical exertion exhilarating.
sentences.cn: 他明显发现体力消耗令人愉悦。

sentences.en: She was hot and breathless from the exertion of cycling uphill.
sentences.cn: 她骑车上山累得全身发热，喘不过气来。
